mapper.update: update users set u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_password = #{uPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_regTime = #{uRegtime,jdbcType=DATE}, u_upTime = #{uUptime,jdbcType=DATE}, c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_comment = #{uComment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u_id, u_name, u_password, u_regTime, u_upTime, c_id, d_id, u_comment from users
